subject: English
title: Chapter 60 Order order
content:
--- Page 1 ---
Order, oD Listen, read and do.
order ! Val, Frat Safot Ha. ‘

i e Make the following lists putting 5-8 items in each list.

* Fruits * Vegetables * Things in your school bag
* Birds * Animals * Colours

(You may find some examples even in this book !)

e Now, re-arrange your list in alphabetical order.
Example : List of some subjects you have to study in high school.

First List List in Alphabetical Order

. Marathi . English (Top of the list )

. English . Geography

. Hindi . Hindi

. Mathematics . History (Middle of the list )
. History . Marathi

. Geography . Mathematics

. Science . Science (Bottom of the list)

6 e Re-arrange your list in the order of your preferences,
putting what you like most at the top.

Cy e Use the lists to put questions to your partner in pairs.
| Example: * What comes before [Le
* What comes after L___]?
* Which subject do you like best ?

* Which subject do you like the least ?
* Do you like LI better than L___]
* What do you like better — L jorL_ 2

UNIT 6 87
